name: Flappy Souls (itch)
description:
One more clone of Flappy Bird!

This one was created for One Script Games Jam. A GameMaker competition where we tried making a whole game using only one game script. Creating all graphics and sounds from code.

You can check source of original jam version below.
It's a real mess. You have been warned!

Fly using spacebar and don't worry too much about your failures.
Every time you die a ghost of your previous run will fly in front of you and take care of a obstacle that killed you before. That makes game easier the more you die.

Features:
  • One Touch Control.
  • Progression system - The more you play the easier it gets!
  • Dark moody graphics.
  • Ghosts showing you your last path.
  • New cave every day!
